locations: CBS Studio Center - 4024 Radford Avenue, Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Four unique Latina Hosts, one unique talk show and the first of its kind, bringing the Latina perspective to the talk show table. The hosts which consists of Bel Hernandez, Dyana Ortelli, Naibe Reynoso and Kikey Castillo discuss the topical news of the day, interview celebrities and dignitaries, and go out into the community to highlight the fascinating places and people who make up the beautiful city of L.A.
imdb.title: Hola! La
plot: The talk show with a Latina perspective on current topics, trends, events and entertainment, hosted by four dynamic bilingual, bi-cultural American Latinas.::Producers

Four unique Latina Hosts, one unique talk show and the first of its kind, bringing the Latina perspective to the talk show table. The hosts which consists of Bel Hernandez, Dyana Ortelli, Naibe Reynoso and Kikey Castillo discuss the topical news of the day, interview celebrities and dignitaries, and go out into the community to highlight the fascinating places and people who make up the beautiful city of L.A.::Producers
